org.apache.juneau

Class ContextBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.ContextBuilder
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BeanContextBuilder, ConfigBuilder, ConfigStoreBuilder

    public abstract class ContextBuilder
extends Object
    Builder class for building instances of serializers and parsers.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected PropertyStoreBuilder psb
      Contains all the modifiable settings for the implementation class.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ContextBuilder

        public ContextBuilder()
        Constructor. Default settings.

      • ContextBuilder

        public ContextBuilder(PropertyStore ps)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        ps - The initial configuration settings for this builder.

      • ContextBuilder

        protected ContextBuilder(PropertyStoreBuilder psb)
        Constructor.

        Used in cases where multiple context builder are sharing the same property store builder.
        (e.g. HtlmlDocBuilder)

        Parameters:
        psb - The property store builder to use.

    • Method Detail

      • getPropertyStoreBuilder

        protected PropertyStoreBuilder getPropertyStoreBuilder()
        Returns access to the inner property store builder.

        Used in conjunction with ContextBuilder(PropertyStoreBuilder) when builders share property store builders.

        Returns:
        The inner property store builder.

      • build

        public abstract Context build()
        Build the object.
        Returns:
        The built object. Subsequent calls to this method will create new instances.

      • apply

        public ContextBuilder apply(PropertyStore copyFrom)
        Copies the settings from the specified property store into this builder.
        Parameters:
        copyFrom - The factory whose settings are being copied.
        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).

      • build

        public <T extends Context> T build(Class<T> c)
        Build a new instance of the specified object.
        Parameters:
        c - The subclass of Context to instantiate.
        Returns:
        A new object using the settings defined in this builder.

      • getPropertyStore

        public PropertyStore getPropertyStore()
        Returns a read-only snapshot of the current property store on this builder.
        Returns:
        A property store object.
